idea-plugin.name: Crypto Price Display
idea-plugin.description:
Crypto Price Display Plugin

Display real-time cryptocurrency prices directly in your IDE status bar.

Features:

  • Real-time price updates
  • Configurable cryptocurrency symbols
  • Customizable refresh intervals
  • Adjustable decimal precision
  • Status icons for connection status
  • Click for detailed price information
  • Right-click context menu with actions
  • Offline mode with cached data
  • Error recovery and retry mechanisms

Supported Cryptocurrencies:

BTC, ETH, and many more against USDT pairs.

Access settings via Tools â†’ Crypto Price Display or right-click the status bar widget.
